head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ZUCKER, ALLYN VAN BAALEN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ZUCKER, ALLYN VAN BAALEN

block.p: ZUCKER-Allyn Van Baalen. 77, wife and best friend of Robert for 58 years. Mother of Micky (Lorry), Alan and Nancy. Cherished grandmother of Garrett (Stefani), Douglas Brent (Jasmine), Douglas Alan (Jennifer), Liz (Mark) Gallo and fortunate great-grandmother of Sarah, David, Stephanie, Alexis, Sebastian and Jessica. Service at C.W. Post Chapel, 11 AM, Monday, September 4. Interment private. Contributions in her honor may be made to C.W. Post, L.I. University.
